About this item

SUITABLE SIZE :- The set of 2 different size vases will look great grouped together. There is an art to matching flowers to these elegant vases, exquisite bottle mouth will help support blooms in the best position, this will bring the most attractive display. Even without flowers and these vases can add a touch of bright color to modern space decor.DECORATIVE VASES FOR DÉCOR & GOOD IDEAL GIFT:- vase for centerpiece, farm house, wedding decoration, birthday decor, event, party, anniversary decoration, cafe, restaurant decorations, ceramic flower vase, shelf decor, flower vases, bedroom decor, table decorations, decorative vase for centerpieces, ceramic vase, kitchen table decor, office table decor, home decor items for living room, decoartion item for home, decorative showpiece, vase for gifting, traditional vases for home decorVERSATILE FLOWER VASE :- A ceramic vase is suitable for pampas grass, palm leaves, cherry blossom, stems, eucalyptus, dried flower bouquets, artificial flowers, mini flower, plants, you can either use alone, or with other vase, to create beautiful dining table centerpiece in your home.
